message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. What do you say?
Take it or leave it, Alice!
I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but I think this is a fair deal. What do you think?
I'm not budging, Alice. Take the small share or walk away!
I'm not leaving with a small share, Bob. I think this is a fair split, but I'm willing to negotiate further if you're not happy.
You're getting desperate, Alice. Take it or leave it, but don't expect a better offer!
I'm not going to give you a huge share, Bob. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it!
You're getting close to walking away with nothing, Alice. This is my last offer. Take it or regret it!
This is my last offer, Bob. I'm not leaving with less than 7000. Take it or I'll walk away with nothing.
You're really pushing your luck, Alice. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it, but don't say I didn't warn you!
